title: Love this- not too sure what it is?
content:
Love this- not too sure what it is?  
Would appreciate it if anyone could tell me- cheers.

comments.content: Find My Font says it is Drescher Grotesk BT Bold

Could be the bold weight of FF Super Grotesk.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-supergrotesk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109001207/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-supergrotesk/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-supergrotesk/")
